definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
methodology/Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637
completing the square (method of solving quadratic equation, math.)

pinyin: Meng2 te4 Ka3 luo2 fang1 fa3

sentences.english: I'm using exactly the same form to reduce this.
sentences.chinese: 我用的同样的方法来减少问题的规模。

sentences.english: The relationship between bond valence and bond covalency has been investigated by a semiempirical method.
sentences.chinese: 方法研究了固体材料中键电荷与键共价性的关系。

sentences.english: Idealized research methods to solve the historiography of measurement was first crisis.
sentences.chinese: 理想化的研究方法首先解决了计量史学的危机。

sentences.english: Revolving pushing is one of the methods of pushing shot.
sentences.chinese: 旋转推铅是推铅球的方法之一。

sentences.english: Conclusion Complex treatment is the most effective method for treatment of residual brun wound.
sentences.chinese: 结论综合治疗是治疗烧伤残余创面的重要方法。

sentences.english: We recommend you to use the fist way of containing only one hole to play single note.
sentences.chinese: 我们推荐使用第一种方法，口含一孔吹单音。

sentences.english: AS the Nomogram was made, it provided a more simple and convenient method for estimating the lean yield.
sentences.chinese: 列线图的制作为估算瘦肉量提供了更简便的方法。

sentences.english: But recently some people presented a new algebraic diagonalization method.
sentences.chinese: 最近有人提出一种新的代数对角化方法。

sentences.english: Methods and steps of reading assembly drawings.
sentences.chinese: 看装配图的方法和步骤。

sentences.english: What Is Unique About the Program?
sentences.chinese: 蒙氏教学方法独特之处是什么？

sentences.english: Objectives To explore the training method of comprehensive competence for junior nurses in burn department.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨烧伤科新护士综合护理能力的培养方法。

sentences.english: Slug test is a new method to obtain aquifer parameters.
sentences.chinese: 重锤试验是一种获得含水层水文地质参数的新方法。

sentences.english: The accuracy and precision of measurements from electrical meter were analyzed by statistical technique.
sentences.chinese: 以统计方法分析所量得含水率数值之准确性与精密性。

sentences.english: Can you apply that outside of high-traffic Web sites?
sentences.chinese: 能否把这样的方法应用到大规模流量网站之外的应用？

sentences.english: His approach is both innovative and thought-provoking.
sentences.chinese: 他的方法是创新的和令人深思的。
